{"id":868510743,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1672482292,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"273 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/868510743/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"20.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n\n        vector<vector<int>> res;\n        unordered_map<int,int> mp;\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); i++) mp[nums[i]] = i;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size() - 2; i++) {\n            if(nums[i] > 0) break; \n            \n            int target = 0 - nums[i];\n            for(int j = i+1; j<nums.size()-1; j++) {\n                int third = target - nums[j];                \n                if(mp.find(third) != mp.end() && mp[third] > j)\n                {\n                    res.push_back({nums[i], nums[j], third});\n                }\n                j = mp[nums[j]];\n            }\n            i = mp[nums[i]];\n        }\n\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false}
